column4: hi can someone help me with this mini question..... I have bought Cisco VPN and it asks  me to tell it where the kernel source files are
I cannot find my Kernel source files on my ssystem
you will need to install them
doesn't it compile it from defauly, does my installaation come with the source files?>
i thought linux comes with the source files for the kernel, cause Cisco VPN requires the headers of the Kernel source
gaim
nope you are using a binary distribution, with ubuntu you have to even install gcc
i need the kernel source files
i am not connected online ;9
not 100% sure but I think you need to enable universe & apt-get install kernel-source-2.4.27
not 100% sure but I think you need to enable universe & apt-get install kernel-source-2.4.27
if you do a package search say using konqueor apt;/ you will see what you need
might also need to install build-essential depending on what you are doing
yes I need to be connected online
I will do this at home
Thanks guys
